ISSUE.TITLE: Auto rotate pictures and thumbnails
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I have pictures that I've taken with my phone in portrait. They look fine in most software as they take the EXIF info and rotated the pictures automatically for viewing. When I upload them into nopCommerce they are rotated 90 degrees. Is it possible to detect the orientation and display the pictures and thumbnails correctly?
